abstract: In preparation for its roadshow, Facebook uploaded its I.P.O. presentation to the Web, a glossy video production with a full cast of characters, traveling video shots and upbeat music.
snippet: In preparation for its roadshow, Facebook uploaded its I.P.O. presentation to the Web, a glossy video production with a full cast of characters, traveling video shots and upbeat music.
lead_paragraph: Starting Monday, Facebook executives will travel the country to field questions from prospective investors and  convince them that the social network is worth $86 billion and perhaps a lot more.
